CustomField.description: Administrators populate this field with the API name of the formula field that the system uses to convert an annual interest rate to a monthly interest rate in Rate & Payment Structures when the default equation Annual Interest Rate / 12 = Monthly Interest Rate is not applicable. By default, it is is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To use a custom monthly interest rate calculation in Rate & Payment Structures, enter the API name of a formula field for the system to convert the annual interest rate to the monthly interest rate.
CustomField.label: Monthly Interest Rate Field
